pricing_description: Mino izahay fa tokony ho azon’ny rehetra idirana ny fanampiana amin’ny alalan’ny IA. Afaka mampiasa maimaimpoana ny app-nay ireo mpampiasa rehetra ao amin’ny sehatra INFODEV.
pricing_personal_use_description: Tonga lafatra ho an’ny olona tsirairay sy ny asa andavanandro
download_app_description: Makà traikefa feno amin’ny findainao. Ho tonga tsy ho ela :)
features_description: Mpanao asa manan-tsaina miaraka amin’ny IA, ho an’ny resaka manan-tsaina, fanohanana manokana, ary valiny avy hatrany – eo am-pelatananao!
features_247_availability_description: Tsy matory ny chatbot-nay! Mahazoa fanampiana amin’ny fotoana rehetra, na dia amin’ny 3 ora maraina aza.
features_voice_text_support_description: Miara-mifampiresaka amin’ny feo na lahatsoratra ho an’ny traikefa tsy mila tanana.
features_customizable_ai_description: Safidio ny fomba hamalian’ny IA anao – matihanina, sariaka, na mahazatra.
company_description: Manavao ny fifandraisan’ny olombelona sy ny teknolojia izahay. Nanomboka tamin’ny fanontaniana tsotra ny diany:
company_question: Ahoana raha afaka manana mpanampy manokana, foana misy, afaka mianatra sy miova ny tsirairay?
mission_description: 5% amin’ny vola azo dia hatokana ho an’i Madagasikara hamonjena ny varika. Mamorona fifandraisana voajanahary sy manan-tsaina, azon’ny rehetra idirana na aiza na aiza. Ny fanoloran-tenanay dia ny hanakaiky kokoa ny teknolojia amin’ny maha-olombelona sy fahaiza-mampiasa azy.
vision_description: Mahita tontolo izahay izay mahasoa sy manokana ny fifandraisana amin’ny teknolojia. Ny vina dia ny hanova ireo asa andavanandro ho traikefa milamina sy mahafinaritra.
innovation_description: Ao amin’ny fototry ny maha-izahay anay ny fanavaozana. Manosika hatrany ny fetran’ny IA izahay mba hamoronana traikefa manan-tsaina sy manokana.
advanced_ai_description: Ny modely IA-nay farany indrindra dia manome valiny marina sy manan-tsaina, mifanaraka amin’ny tsirairay.
newsletter_description: Misorata anarana ao amin’ny gazetinay hahazo vaovao farany momba ny toetoetra vaovao, famoahana vokatra, sy maro hafa.
ai_assistant_description: Mpanampy IA ho an’ny web sy mobile izay manamora asa, mamaly fanontaniana, ary manatsara ny vokatra amin’ny fanohanana manokana sy amin’ny fotoana tena izy.
